questions.prompt: In BG 11.1, what does Arjuna request from Krishna?
choices: To see your divine form and cosmic manifestation
questions.feedback: Arjuna seeks direct perception of Krishna's transcendental nature.

questions.prompt: According to BG 11.2, who has the power to grant Arjuna this vision?
choices: Only I can grant this; you need divine eyes to see my form
questions.feedback: Krishna alone possesses the power to reveal His divine form.

questions.prompt: In BG 11.5, what does Krishna offer to show Arjuna?
choices: My divine forms, countless and unlimited
questions.feedback: Krishna reveals infinite divine manifestations beyond ordinary perception.

questions.prompt: What does BG 11.7 teach about the cosmic form?
choices: Behold the entire universe in my body; all that exists is within me
questions.feedback: The cosmos is contained within Krishna's divine manifestation.

questions.prompt: According to BG 11.8, what characterizes the vision of the cosmic form?
choices: One cannot see it with ordinary eyes; it is beyond perception
questions.feedback: Divine transcendental eyes are necessary to perceive Krishna's form.

questions.prompt: In BG 11.12-14, what is the impact of Arjuna witnessing the cosmic form?
choices: He experiences great fear, wonder, and trembling
He becomes intellectually curious about the nature of reality
questions.feedback: The direct revelation of divine power overwhelms mortal consciousness.

questions.prompt: What does BG 11.24-26 teach about the form Arjuna sees?
choices: He sees terrifying forms with infinite mouths, eyes, and weapons
questions.feedback: The cosmic form represents both creative and destructive divine powers.

questions.prompt: According to BG 11.32, what is declared about this cosmic form?
choices: I am time, the great destroyer of all; I am here to consume all
questions.feedback: The cosmic form represents the ultimate power of time and destiny.

questions.prompt: In BG 11.33-34, what does Krishna promise regarding this cosmic form?
choices: All those before you shall be slain; they are already doomed by me
questions.feedback: Divine will transcends mortal plans; all outcomes are predetermined.

questions.prompt: What does BG 11.36 teach about the impact of this vision?
choices: Be not fearful; drop your timidity; arise and fight
questions.feedback: Understanding Krishna's supremacy removes fear and empowers action.

questions.prompt: According to BG 11.37-38, how do the celestial beings respond to the cosmic form?
choices: All praise you and bow; they chant your glory
questions.feedback: The cosmic form commands universal reverence and worship.

questions.prompt: In BG 11.40, what is the effect on Arjuna of this divine revelation?
choices: Fear has left me; I am in harmony; all my confusion is gone
questions.feedback: Direct knowledge of Krishna's supremacy grants complete peace and clarity.

questions.prompt: What does BG 11.42-43 teach about the nature of this cosmic form?
choices: No being can fully comprehend my form; it is infinite
questions.feedback: Krishna's nature is beyond mortal comprehension in its fullness.

questions.prompt: According to BG 11.44, what does Krishna offer as a means of worship?
choices: Through exclusive loving devotion one can know me and enter my abode
questions.feedback: Exclusive devotion is the highest and most direct path to Krishna.

questions.prompt: In BG 11.45, what does Krishna conclude about the vision?
choices: This form cannot be regained by study or sacrifice; only through devotion
questions.feedback: The divine form is revealed exclusively to sincere, devoted disciples.

questions.prompt: What does BG 11.48 teach about those who surrender?
choices: Be not afraid; I am pleased with you; I grant you grace
questions.feedback: Krishna's grace flows to those who surrender with faith.

questions.prompt: According to BG 11.50-51, what is Krishna's promise?
choices: I am pleased with you; do not fear; abandon all worry
questions.feedback: Krishna assures the sincere disciple of His protection and grace.

questions.prompt: In BG 11.53, what is the only way to know the cosmic form fully?
choices: Through exclusive devotion to me can one know me thus
questions.feedback: Perfect knowledge comes through unwavering devotional service.

questions.prompt: What does BG 11.54 teach about achieving Krishna consciousness?
choices: Through bhakti (devotion), one transcends all bondage and attains the Absolute
questions.feedback: Pure devotion is the direct path to realizing the Absolute Truth.

questions.prompt: According to BG 11.55, what is the ultimate perfection?
choices: One becomes my dear devotee; all is revealed; one attains me
questions.feedback: The highest perfection is becoming Krishna's intimate devotee.

questions.prompt: In Chapter 11, what is the main theme?
choices: The revelation of Krishna's cosmic form and divine supremacy
questions.feedback: Chapter 11 reveals Krishna's infinite transcendental nature.

questions.prompt: What practical lesson does the cosmic vision teach?
choices: Understanding divine supremacy destroys fear and pride
questions.feedback: Witnessing the cosmic form purifies Arjuna's consciousness.

questions.prompt: According to the chapter, why does Krishna show this form?
choices: To convince Arjuna of His supremacy and authority
questions.feedback: The vision confirms Krishna's authority to instruct Arjuna.

questions.prompt: In BG 11, what does Arjuna finally understand?
choices: Krishna is the Supreme Lord; all must surrender to Him
questions.feedback: Arjuna gains complete faith through direct perception.

questions.prompt: What does this chapter teach about approaching the Divine?
choices: Humble surrender with faith opens the way to divine grace
questions.feedback: Devotion and humility are prerequisites for divine revelation.
